document_data.name: Red Spears
document_data.mainbody: The '''Red Spears''' was a mercenary company composed only of [[orc]]s.
document_data.History: In [[1479 DR]], the Red Spears were hired by [[Alasklerbanbastos]] to bolster [[Threskel]]'s army during the war against [[Chessenta]].
